column5: ]Maybe heading to Lil Shab with northern wilderness outfitters . Never have fished this lake. ANY help or INFORMATION would be helpful. The dates would be the opener in May. Fish mostly walleyes, and some bigger northerns Thank you

Not familiar with the lake, but if you are flying very far north, the opening week has been prone to still have some ice on some of the waters the last few years. Some camps have even cancelled opening the first week. You might want to keep in touch with the folks at the camp on this. Bill
